page.description: A sample component that demonstrates how the FormView control can be used to create a mobile optimized form.

discussion.p: The *[ui:MobileForms_StarterExample]* template is a sample template that demonstrates how to create *[link:mobile forms@https://www.alphasoftware.com/mobile-forms]* using the FormView control.

The template uses [Editors] to edit data in the application. Editors can be used to modify multiple values in a form. Using Editors eliminates the need to create individual controls for each field, reducing the size of your application. For forms with a lot of fields, Editors can have a significant impact on the size of your app.
